description:
Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.

Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.

GADGETS Magazine is not just about smartphones and mobile devices, computers and laptops, entertainment centers, gaming consoles, home appliances, and other electronic stuff. A gadget is anything and everything—in the home, kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom, garage, in the office, at school, for travel, or just about anywhere. It’s what you wear, what you carry in your bag, and what you aspire to have.

GADGETS Magazine features more than just electronic equipment and high-tech trends. We are redefining the term “tech-lifestyle” to cover virtually all aspects of living in a smart, connected, digital world.

Established in 2000, GADGETS Magazine is the Philippines’ first tech-lifestyle magazine. Staffed by young Filipino writers and artists, it is the only magazine to have earned two Tinta Awards for Special/Creative Executions from the United Print Media Group.

For your daily dose of tech-lifestyle news, visit www.gadgetsmagazine.com.ph

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/GadgetsMagazine

Follow us on Twitter: @gadgetsmagazine.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

O jornal A BOLA sendo uma referência entre os desportivos e a imprensa generalista ao longo de mais de sete décadas de existência, oferece aos seus leitores acesso a toda a informação desportiva num novo suporte.

A inovação e a constante procura em servir melhor os nossos leitores, levou a que fosse criada uma aplicação que permitisse uma experiência de leitura semelhante à edição de papel mas enriquecida com vídeos, mais fotos e outros conteúdos.



Acompanhe todas as notícias do seu clube ou modalidade preferida, para onde quer que vá e à distância dos seus dedos.



Desta forma os nossos leitores podem usufruir da aplicação A BOLA Edição Digital nas seguintes modalidades:



Assinatura Mensal (1 mês) 
Assinatura Anual (12 meses) 


Subscreva a aplicação do jornal A BOLA.


- O pagamento será efetuado na conta iTunes registada, ao confirmar a compra.
- A assinatura renova-se automaticamente. O cancelamento da mesma deverá ser feito 24horas antes do fim do período da subscrição em vigor.
- A cobrança da assinatura renovada será efetuada na conta nas 24 horas anteriores ao fim da assinatura em vigor.
- As assinaturas poderão ser geridas pelo utilizador e a auto-renovação poderá ser desativada, depois da compra, mediante a configuração de conta do utilizador.
- Não serão permitidos cancelamentos de uma assinatura durante o período de duração da mesma.

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS

NEWS VIDEOS

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS

OlaMoz é uma aplicação que permite ler jornais, sintetizar as notícias, imagens, clipes dos jornais e revistas locais mais populares. OlaMoz também traz as últimas notícias do mundo com muitas fontes internacionais confiáveis.
Porquê o OlaMoz é o aplicativo de notícias favorito dos usuários?
• Notícias de última hora, sintetizando notícias atuais 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana. Todos os eventos mais quentes em casa e no exterior.
• Assistir a vídeos de notícias, clipes de entretenimento de alta qualidade.
• Temperatura integrada, taxa de câmbio, resultados de futebol ao vivo e muito mais ...
• Economiza custo de dados 3G / 4G. Não consome memória do dispositivo.
• Você pode escolher seus jornais e categorias favoritos.
• Otimizado para smartphones e tablets.
OlaMoz é a sua fonte confiável para cobertura de notícias em tempo real a qualquer hora e em qualquer lugar

Se quer acompanhar o que está a acontecer no país e no mundo, ao minuto e sem complicações, a app Notícias ao Minuto garante-lhe informação rápida, clara e sempre atualizada.

INFORMAÇÃO EM TEMPO REAL
Otimizámos a velocidade e a estabilidade da aplicação para que possa ler as notícias de forma mais fluida e sem interrupções. Tudo para que esteja sempre a par do essencial.

TUDO O QUE IMPORTA. NUM SÓ LUGAR.
A app reúne as principais áreas de interesse: Portugal, Mundo, Política, Economia, Desporto, Fama, Lifestyle, Cultura, Tecnologia, Auto e outras secções que marcam a atualidade.

UMA APP QUE SE ADAPTA A SI
Escolha os temas que quer seguir, personalize alertas e receba notificações relevantes ao longo do dia. Acompanhe também o seu clube ou área de interesse em tempo real.

PARTILHE COM QUEM QUISER
Guarde artigos, envie sugestões e partilhe notícias diretamente nas redes sociais ou através das apps que utiliza no dia a dia.

RECONHECIMENTO DO PÚBLICO
• Escolha do Consumidor – 9.ª vez consecutiva (2025)
• Produto do Ano – Aplicação de Notícias (2024)

Descarregue a app Notícias ao Minuto e mantenha-se informado, onde quer que esteja.

Grafismo renovado, navegação melhorada e maior protagonismo da multimédia. Leitura mais simplificada e intuitiva das notícias.

description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

Key benefits include:

Customizable App Experience 
(+) Follow your your favorite WSJ journalists
(+) Access interactive charts to follow the latest market trends
(+) Create personalized stock watch lists 
(+) Get content relevant to your job title and industry

Award-winning Journalism Delivered To Your Mobile Device
(+) A real-time news feed, curated by WSJ’s award-winning journalists throughout the day
(+) Up to date global coverage on the news that matters 
(+) Access to curated CFO, CIO, and CMO article feeds

Full Access to WSJ, Anywhere, Anytime
(+) Full access to WSJ on any device
(+) Ability to listen to WSJ articles on your commute, hands-free
(+) Offline reading, enabling you to remain informed, wherever you are

Real Time Market News - Never Miss a Critical Development
(+) Up to the minute stock market quotes
(+) Alerts and notifications for breaking news and updates on the stories, companies and industries that matter most to you
(+) Articles relevant to your personalized stock list

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions. 

Stay ahead, stay informed – with The Wall Street Journal App.

Read 7,000+ of the world’s most popular newspapers and magazines on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy unlimited reading on up to 3 devices with a 7-day free trial of PressReader Premium. 
 
PressReader is the best way to read your favourite magazines and newspapers in one place—from local stories to global news, and everything in between. Download complete issues and switch between the original print view and a mobile-optimized text view. Bring it all to life with Auto-Translate to over 30 languages or listen to stories with our text-to-speech features.  
 
Subscribe to PressReader Premium to get unlimited access to most publications in the catalog or purchase single issues of your favorite title. Individual subscriptions for some publications are also available. To access PressReader without a subscription, visit one of our HotSpot partners.
